name: Global Access Trading Engine
overview: Global Access Trading Engine operates as an electronic marketplace for the primary issuance and secondary trading of private placements, and restricted and illiquid securities. It operates an Internet-based electronic trading platform that enables investment firms to transact in illiquid securities, including private investment in public equities, warrants, and other financing vehicles, as well as supports and executes trades for the buyers and sellers of restricted and illiquid securities. The companyâ€™s alternative trading platform also provides an infrastructure to buy and sell-side participants. Global Access Trading Engine was formerly known as Zealous ATS, LLC. The company is based in New York, New York. As of October 21, 2008, Global Access Trading Engine operates as a subsidiary of Global Access Holdings LLC.

acquisition.source_description: Global Access Holdings Makes Strategic Acquisition in Illiquid Security Marketplace
